name: Jeff Chandler
description:
"This Jewish heartthrob starred as Iron Man in the movie of the same name..."

Who is Robert Downey Jr?

Well, yes, of course. But also Jeff Chandler!

Who is Jeff Chandler?

If this was the 1950s, you wouldn't be asking that question. Chandler (real name: Ira Grossel) was one of the leading actors of the period, starring in such exciting films as "Female on the Beach", "The Tattered Dress", "Man in the Shadow", "A Stranger in My Arms"... We swear those were all mainstream movies and not pornography! We think...

Chandler was best-known for portraying Cochise is "Broken Arrow" (no, not the one with John Travolta and Christian Slater). He even got an Oscar nomination for it, which, considering it was a Jew playing a Native American... let's just move on.

Where were we? Oh, yes, "Iron Man"! A 1951 movie where Chandler played a boxer with a name of Coke Mason.

Boy, movies sure have changed...
